verses.verse: It happened on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had finished setting <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> it and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H3627>it,<s%> with all its furniture, and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> and sanctified <S%H6942>them;<s%>

that the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H7126>offered.<s%> These were the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes.<s%> These are they who were <S%H5975>over<s%> those who were <S%H6485>numbered:<s%>

and they <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6632>covered<s%> <S%H5699>wagons,<s%> and <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H1241>oxen;<s%> a <S%H5699>wagon<s%> for every <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> and for each <S%H259>one<s%> an <S%H7794>ox:<s%> and they <S%H7126>presented<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Accept<s%> these from <S%H5647>them,<s%> that they may be used in doing the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H5656>service.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

He <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5656>service:<s%>

and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5699>wagons<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5656>service,<s%> under the <S%H3027>direction<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

But to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3808>none,<s%> because the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> belonged to <S%H5375>them;<s%> they carried it on their <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

The <S%H5387>princes<s%> gave <S%H7126>offerings<s%> for the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was <S%H4886>anointed,<s%> even the <S%H5387>princes<s%> <S%H7126>gave<s%> their <S%H7133>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "They shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> their <S%H7133>offering,<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> on his <S%H3117>day,<s%> for the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>"

He who <S%H7126>offered<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%>

and his <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H259>was:<s%> one <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>platter,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of which was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H259>shekels,<s%> one <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3709>ladle<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4392>shekels,<s%> full of <S%H7004>incense;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H5930>old,<s%> for a burnt offering;
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%>

and for the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H6260>goats,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H7133>old.<s%> This was the offering of <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab.<s%>
On the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> gave his <S%H7126>offering.<s%>

He <S%H7126>offered<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>platter,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of which was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H259>shekels,<s%> one <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3709>ladle<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4392>shekels,<s%> full of <S%H7004>incense;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H5930>old,<s%> for a burnt offering;
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%>

and for the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H6260>goats,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H7133>old.<s%> This was the offering of <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar.<s%>
On the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>

gave his <S%H7133>offering:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>platter,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of which was a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H259>shekels,<s%> one <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3709>ladle<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4392>shekels,<s%> full of <S%H7004>incense;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H5930>old,<s%> for a burnt offering;
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H259>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%>

and for the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H6260>goats,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H7133>old.<s%> This was the offering of <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon.<s%>
On the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>

gave his <S%H7133>offering:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>platter,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of which was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H259>shekels,<s%> one <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3709>ladle<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4392>shekels,<s%> full of <S%H7004>incense;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H5930>old,<s%> for a burnt offering;
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%>

and for the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H6260>goats,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H7133>old.<s%> This was the offering of <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur.<s%>
On the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>

gave his <S%H7133>offering:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>platter,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of which was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H259>shekels,<s%> one <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3709>ladle<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4392>shekels,<s%> full of <S%H7004>incense;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H5930>old,<s%> for a burnt offering;
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%>

and for the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H6260>goats,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H7133>old:<s%> this was the offering of <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai.<s%>
On the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>

gave his <S%H7133>offering:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>platter,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of which was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3701>shekels,<s%> one silver <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3709>ladle<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4392>shekels,<s%> full of <S%H7004>incense;<s%>
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> male <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H5930>old,<s%> for a burnt offering;
<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%>

and for the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H6260>goats,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> male <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H7133>old.<s%> This was the offering of <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel.<s%>
On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud,<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>

gave his <S%H7133>offering:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H7086>platter,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of which was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H259>shekels,<s%> one <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4219>bowl<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H4392>full<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%>

<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%>
